name: Deflector (itch) (Mad Magawly Games)
description: A game where you try to prevent the ball from getting past the walls as you bounce it off of a small spinning triangle. You read correct, a real spinning triangle. There are 3 difficulties in this game that if you beat them you will be granted with disease immunity. No, I am not a snake oil salesman, I'm a game developer so you can trust me. The game is free and supplies unlimited and if you would like to donate all, some money it would be greatly appreciated. If you don't want to donate then fu...thank you for playing my little game and i hope it brought joy to your heart. I will end you. :]
